summary: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Charlotte Lewis|BD Wong|Tony Denison|Tim Guinee|Don Harvey|Tom Lister Jr.|Tom Wright|Catherine Bell|Trevor Goddard|Kevin Tighe|Thomas Gibson|Perry Lang|Aldo Sambrell|Juan Pedro Tudela|Ignacio Carre√±o|Tookta Saengsuk|Loon Tuk Team|Sri-Taow Soa Tong|Master Bank Na Charat Petch|Pao Porapak|Saeng Ta Ngai Pongsuan|Ancharee Suwanpong|Po Pao Pee|Somchai Santitharangkun|Sukoltorn Tungkasen|Somsak Homchantoa|Pradit Seeriem|Komkrib 'Krib' Wongwirot|Numchai Polmuang|Michael S. Garvey
title: Hombres de acero
